Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ALF-E (Anti-lipopolysaccharide factor, litvan residues 32-53, a fragment, synthetic AMPs20)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (34.6%) toJaponicin-2LF.Activity: Active against Gram+  B. cereus ATCC 11778 (MIC 20-40 uM), B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 10-20 uM), stationis CIP: 101282 (MIC 5-10 uM), M. maritypicum CIP 105733 (MIC 5-10 uM), M. luteus CIP 4345 (MIC 10-20 uM), S. aureus ATCC 25932 (MIC 10-20 uM), Gram- V. nigripulchritudo (MIC 20-40 uM), and fungi F. oxysporum (MIC 5-10 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Matos GM, Schmitt P, Barreto C, et al. 2018, Brazil, South America
Literature Information.Title: Massive Gene Expansion and Sequence Diversification Is Associated with Diverse Tissue Distribution, Regulation and Antimicrobial Properties of Anti-Lipopolysaccharide Factors in Shrimp
